<h3 id="X22796">X(22796) = ORTHOLOGIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: EHRMANN-MID TO 3rd FERMAT-DAO</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; sqrt(3)*(S^2*SA+3*SW*SB*SC)+2*(S^2+3*SB*SC)*S  :  :

<br>
<b>X(22796) = 3*X(4)+X(616) = 3*X(5)-2*X(6669) = X(13)-3*X(381) = 4*X(546)-X(16001) = X(616)-3*X(5617) = 5*X(1656)-3*X(21156) = 5*X(3091)-X(6770) = 5*X(3091)-2*X(20415) = 5*X(3843)-X(13103) = 3*X(5469)-X(12188) = X(5474)-3*X(15561) = 4*X(6669)-3*X(6771) = X(9901)-5*X(18492) = X(14830)-3*X(22490) = 5*X(19709)-3*X(22489)</b>
<p>
The reciprocal orthologic center of these triangles is X(13).</p>
<p>X(22796) lies on these lines:
{4,616}, {5,6669}, {6,13}, {15,22892}, {30,618}, {114,1080}, {382,5473}, {398,14136}, {543,6298}, {546,5478}, {621,7809}, {626,3642}, {1478,12952}, {1479,12942}, {1656,21156}, {2782,5479}, {2794,6774}, {3091,6770}, {3583,13076}, {3585,18974}, {3830,5463}, {3843,13103}, {3850,20252}, {5066,5459}, {5318,6782}, {5321,6115}, {5474,15561}, {5965,20425}, {6108,22847}, {6670,12042}, {7975,18525}, {9818,9916}, {9901,18492}, {9955,11705}, {9982,18500}, {10061,12185}, {10062,10895}, {10077,12184}, {10078,10896}, {11121,14492}, {12205,18502}, {12337,18491}, {12472,18495}, {12473,18497}, {12699,12781}, {12793,18507}, {12922,18516}, {12932,18517}, {12990,18520}, {12991,18522}, {13105,18542}, {13107,18544}, {13917,18538}, {13982,18762}, {14830,22490}, {16530,16965}, {18581,22513}, {18761,22773}, {18764,22998}, {19709,22489}, {22601,22630}</p>
<p>
X(22796) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {4, 5617}, {382, 5473}, {3830, 5463}, {7975, 18525}, {12699, 12781}, {12793, 18507}<br>
X(22796) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (14, 381, 19130), (381, 3818, 22797), (6777, 16808, 5472)<br>
</p>
